Attacks.Name: Horn Attack
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Nidorino gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target is pushed S.

Attacks.Name: Poison Jab
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Poison special condition.

Attacks.Name: Double Kick
Attacks.Effect: This attack can be made twice in the same action. The second attack must target the same character.

Superpowers.Name: Poison Point
Superpowers.Effect: When Nidorino is targeted by a physical attack and the attacker rolls a wild, the attacking character gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Aggressive Charge
Superpowers.Effect: Nidorino advances M. If this movement ends within Range 1 of an enemy character, that character suffers 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Horn Drill
Attacks.Effect: If this attack deals damage, the target gains the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Venom Burst
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Nidorino suffer 1 damage and gain the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Nidoking character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
